answerText: Les Fleurs du Mal [accept The Flowers of Evil][10] This French poet wrote Les Fleurs du Mal. He also worked as a translator of Edgar Allan Poe works.
heading: MUT |2012 | 2 | 16 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This work calls the reader a hypocrite in the poem "Au Lecteur." For 10 points each: [10] Name this 1857 poetry collection that includes the section "Spleen and Ideal" as well as the poems "The Albatross" and "The Vampire."
